title: What people think the faces of Riven mains look like
body:
https://avvesione.files.wordpress.com/2014/06/akuma_no_riddle-11-nio-assassin-judge-shaman-evil_grin-shark_teeth_smile-evil-dramatic_lighting-red-amusing-funny.jpg

But this is what we truly look like 

https://i.imgur.com/DbOyTvP.png

We just like chill, we just chilling

{{champion:44}} {{champion:110}}

I thought that it looks like this
https://imgur.com/a/RmQlX

When it Comes to memes, rivens are the be all end all evil, but actually, i know some riven mains who make me see their mains comm like this:

https://orig00.deviantart.net/73c0/f/2014/073/2/6/melancholy_riven__gif__by_nielspeterdejong-d7a5bgi.gif

Edit: But ingame i see her like this:

https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7ZeHPZ6jgM1nxI4g/giphy.gif

Actually that top face is the face of Yorick mains. Secretly sadistic. That group is. Trap you in his little walls and have his way with you for 3 secs while his ghouls and maiden help him.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

mmhh really hard to picture a riven main, because I always imagine them laying their faces on the keyboard.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}} just joking ofc
I like being chill.
Please, that first pic is your face when you score a multikill from just your ultimate.

It's odd, isn't it...when getting close, they look chill - except it is the last thing to ever see before the sword falls, so no wonder people think Riven mains all look like raging demons.

But do feel free to include a [wide-shot](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/e7/cc/32/e7cc328599078c25d0807525bbbd3979.jpg) next time, to give the whole story. ;)
